channel.title: Monerica - Newest and Sponsored Listings
channel.description: The latest additions and sponsors in our directory.

item.title: kevinhq.com

item.title: ExRateHub
item.description: Exchanges > Comparison/ Aggregation : Collaborates with reliable platforms, ensures a safe and efficient exchange process for digital assets. item.title: Jewelry Liquidation
item.description: Businesses > Luxury Goods : One of the largest fine jewelry online retailers with over 10,000 designs. All items made in USA - Note: During checkout, select Bitcoin/Crypto as payment type. Although the button will say “Pay with Bitcoin” the following screen will give you an option of selecting your currency of choice, including Monero. - Location: Los Angeles, CA - Contact: sales@jeweley-liquidation.com

item.description: Non-Profits > Technologies : A group of simple, privacy respecting, open source apps without ads and unnecessary permissions, with customizable colors.
